info.title: Bank Account Prenote Entry
info.description:
A reservation on a bank account for either a debit or a credit amount.
You can use this API to create, query,read, update, or delete prenote entries of a bank account.

Remark:
The service Bank Account Prenote Entry is assigned to service group Transactional Banking.

General:
The properties of the EDM that are based on a code GDT do not contain supplementary components (e.g. listID) that are known from the GDTs of the enterprise services.

x-sap-shortText: Manage prenote entries of a bank account using this synchronous inbound service

get.description: Is a request to query bank account prenote entries

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

Required filter properties:
- BankAccountUUID

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description: Is a request to create a bank account prenote entry

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description:
Is the unique identifier for a bank account prenote entry.  
GDT: UUID

parameters.name: BankAccountUUID
parameters.description:
A BankAccountUUID is an universal unique identifier for the bank account to which the entry is assigned.  
Remark:  UUID identifies a bank account prenote entry. The BankAccountUUID is required for performant read of one prenote entry because BankAccountUUID is part of the primary index of the database table.  
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  
Integrity Conditions: If cross-navigation is used, filter for BankAccountUUID must not be used.  GDT: NOSC_UUID

get.summary: Read Bank Account Prenote Entry by ID
get.description: Is a request to read a bank account prenote entry

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

patch.description: Is a request to update a bank account prenote entry

delete.description: Is a request to cancel a bank account prenote entry

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET BankAccountPrenoteEntries HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

UUID.title: Is the unique identifier for a bank account prenote entry.

BankAccountUUID.title: A BankAccountUUID is an universal unique identifier for the bank account to which the entry is assigned.
BankAccountUUID.description:
Remark:  UUID identifies a bank account prenote entry. The BankAccountUUID is required for performant read of one prenote entry because BankAccountUUID is part of the primary index of the database table.  
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  
Integrity Conditions: If cross-navigation is used, filter for BankAccountUUID must not be used.  GDT: NOSC_UUID

RequesterBankAccountPrenoteEntryID.title: Identifies a bank account prenote entry and is assigned by the requester of the bank account prenote entry.
RequesterBankAccountPrenoteEntryID.description:
The RequesterBankAccountPrenoteEntryID in combination with the BankAccountUUID uniquely identifies a bank account prenote entry.  
GDT: BankAccountPrenoteEntryID_V1

ChangeStateID.title: Identifies a change state.
ChangeStateID.description:
Remark:  1) Property is required for subsequent usage of corresponding SOAP update service. 2) Property is used as ETag. 
GDT: ChangeStateID

LifeCycleStatusCode.title: Coded representation of the life cycle status of a bank account prenote entry.
LifeCycleStatusCode.description:
The values for the BDT BankAccountPrenoteEntryLifeCycleStatusCode_V1 are:  
1 - Created  
2 - Creation in approval 
3 - Update in approval 
4 - Discard in approval 
5 - Discarded 
6 - Cancelled 
7 - Assigned 
8 - Creation Exception 
Filter:  Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  
BDT: BankAccountPrenoteEntryLifeCycleStatusCode_V1

TypeCode.title: Coded representation of a type of bank account prenote entry.
TypeCode.description:
Filter:  Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  
GDT: BankAccountPrenoteEntryTypeCode

RejectionReasonCode.title: A coded representation of reason for reject of a bank account prenote entry.

BankPaymentCommunicationChannelCode.title: Coded representation of the communication channel for payments in a bank.

ValidityStartDate.title: Date on which the bank account prenote entry becomes valid.
ValidityStartDate.description:
At the time of creation, the default posting date of payment transactions of the underlying bank posting area of the bank account for which the bank account prenote entry is created will be the validity start date of the bank account prenote entry.  
GDT: Date

PlannedValidityEndDate.title: Date on which the validity of a bank acocunt prenote entry is planned to end.
PlannedValidityEndDate.description:
PlannedValidityEndDate is the date up to and including which the bank account prenote entry could be assigned to a corresponding bank account payment entry and might be relevent for the calculation of available amount of the bank account for which the bank account prenote entry is created.  
GDT: Date

ValidityEndDate.title: Date on which the validity of the bank account prenote entry ends.
ValidityEndDate.description:
ValidityEndDate specifies the date on which the status of the bank account prenote entry changed to Deleted or Assigned.  
GDT: Date

BankAccountDebitIndicator.title: Indicates whether the bank account will be debited by the bank account prenote entry or not.
BankAccountDebitIndicator.description:
If the BankAccountDebitIndicator is true and the BankAccountAvailableAmountRelevanceIndicator is true, then the bank account   available amount will be debited by the prenote balance.  
If the BankAccountDebitIndicator is false and the    BankAccountAvailableAmountRelevanceIndicator is true, then the bank account available amount will be credited by the prenote balance.   
GDT: Indicator

BankAccountAvailableAmountRelevanceIndic.title: Indicates whether the bank account prenote entry is relevant for the calculation of the available amount of the bank account or not.

LimitCheckDeactivationRequestedIndicator.title: Indicates whether deactivation of limit check was requested for processing the bank account prenote entry.
LimitCheckDeactivationRequestedIndicator.description:
The limit of the bank account is the available amount of the bank account. The LimitCheckDeactivationRequestedIndicator will deactivate   the check of available amount of the bank account for which the bank account prenote entry is to be created.  
GDT: Indicator

AdditionalMaterialChecksDeactivationRequ.title: Indicates whether deactivation of the all material checks (except limit check) is requested for processing the bank account prenote entry.

ValidIndicator.title: Indicates whether the bank account prenote entry is valid or not.
ValidIndicator.description:
A bank account prenote entry can be valid only when LifeCycleStatusCode is 1 (Created) and current posting date is between ValidityStartDate  and ValidityEndDate.  
GDT: Indicator

Note.title: A note about a bank account prenote entry.
Note.description:
Constraint: Maximum 50 characters are allowed.  
GDT: LANGUAGEINDEPENDENT_MEDIUM_Note

AdditionalNote.title: An additional note about a bank account prenote entry.
AdditionalNote.description:
Constraint: Maximum 10 characters are allowed.  
GDT: LANGUAGEINDEPENDENT_SHORT_Note

MaterialCheckNote.title: A note for processing customer owned checks for a prenote entry.
MaterialCheckNote.description:
Constraint: Maximum 65 characters are allowed.  
GDT: LANGUAGEINDEPENDENT_MEDIUM_Note

MaterialCheckAdditionalNote.title: An additional note for processing customer owned checks for a prenote entry.
MaterialCheckAdditionalNote.description:
Constraint: Maximum 6 characters are allowed.  
GDT: LANGUAGEINDEPENDENT_SHORT_Note

BankAccountCurrencyAmount.title: Amount in the currency of a bank account.

TransactionCurrencyAmount.title: Amount in the currency of a business transaction.

Reference.title: References of the bank account prenote entry.

BusinessProcessChainAssignment.title: The Business Process Chain Assignment is the assignment of a bank prenote entry to a business process chain.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountpreno.title: Bank Account Prenote Entry
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountpreno.description: A Bank Account Prenote Entry represents a reservation on a Bank Account for either a debit or a credit amount.  A Bank Account is an account that holds funds in a bank and is subject to deposits and withdrawals.

BankAccountUUID.title: A BankAccountUUID is an universal unique identifier for the bank account to which the entry is assigned.
BankAccountUUID.description:
Remark:  UUID identifies a bank account prenote entry. The BankAccountUUID is required for performant read of one prenote entry because BankAccountUUID is part of the primary index of the database table.  
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.  
Integrity Conditions: If cross-navigation is used, filter for BankAccountUUID must not be used.  GDT: NOSC_UUID

GDT: BankAccountPrenoteEntryID_V1
